text: Vincent Chalvon-Demersay is a French producer and executive producer. He is the creator of the animated series Team Galaxy, Totally Spies, Martin Mystery and The Amazing Spiez! He recently resigned as president of Marathon Media. He however still works at Marathon Media. ==Created series (Marathon Media)== * 1. Team Galaxy * 2. The Amazing Spiez! * 3. Martin Mystery * 4. Monster Buster Club * 5. Totally Spies! * 6. Rekkit Rabbit * 7. Blake and the Aliens * 8.
